extendedInfo.description: THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN! Homer accidently caused a meltdown that wiped out Springfield. DâOH! Now, itâs up to you to rebuild it! From the writers of The Simpsons, tap into a city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield... for FREE.HOW FUN IS IT? LET US COUNT THE WAYS!1. First, you can get it for free!2. Make Springfield just like you want it.3. Help Homer find Marge, Bart, Lisa, and the rest of his family and friends! (Ned Flanders, too.)4. Complete tasks to earnâ¦ mmm, donuts!5. Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at Kwik-E-Mart.6. Grow and harvest Tomacco on Cletusâs Farm.7. Party down with Duffman at Duff Brewery.8. See how your Indolence, Consumerism,and Gluttony stack up on the Conform-o-meter.9. Enjoy exclusive animated scenes sure to please fans of TVâs longest-running comedy.10. Visit your friendsâ Springfields, play pranks, and collect cash.11. And did we mentionâ¦ itâs free to play?SPRINGFIELD NEVER LOOKED SO GOODWith HD graphics â youâll get an eyeful of greener greens, yellower yellows, and more.IS THAT ALL? Of course not! Did you know that you can even play this game in French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, and Korean?But who wants to read all this text on a screen? So you should CHECK OUT THE SCREENSHOTS because the screenshots really sell itâ¦ even though we really donât have to sell this gameâ¦ because itâs FREE!**This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 175MB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads (we promise itâs worth the wait).**Notes:â You must have an Internet connection to play, so please make sure your device is connected.

reviews.title: Freaking cool
reviews.comment: I love the game if you like the Simpsons and everyone in their neighborhood then you\'ll love the thrill of finding them all and the mission in the depth of the game
reviews.author: p floyd

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Loads in good time graphics are amazing just wish you could rotate items a full 360 degrees other than that the game is pretty good
reviews.author: Lacy Gail

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Amazing game. Really addicting. Wish you could buy more land. I\'m running out of space!
reviews.author: Chris Hubka

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: The developers of this game should add a building that pays out a doughnut a day or something along those lines.not totally convinced about putting my hard earned $ into a game on my phone
reviews.author: Dustin H

reviews.title: Best Game Ever
reviews.comment: I love it. I love the graphics, the interaction with the characters. You don\'t need to spend money to earn things. It\'s just a great game. Just wish u could turn buildings all the way around.
reviews.author: Linnea Poole

reviews.title: Please fix!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing this for a while and now it won\'t even load.
reviews.author: Doug Castas

reviews.title: Enjoyed it
reviews.comment: It is fun tapping all your rewards lol, just wish you can earn donuts faster hehe. Other than that you can enjoy a simple game
reviews.author: Sothary Nham

reviews.title: Great timesink!
reviews.comment: Daily player send me an invite to make more money faster In game. Graphics cool its like recreating your own springfield. Toadcadinski420
reviews.author: Chris Martinez

reviews.title: Fun and entertaining to any fan of funny
reviews.comment: Plays perfectly to the show. Enjoyable to any user, a must-have for a Simpsons fan!
reviews.author: Mack Holland

reviews.title: Definitely fun
reviews.comment: This game is fun for sure...I would give it five stars if I could cancel a task I started instead of waiting.  Sucks to find out you can finish a quest after you\'re already doing something with the character.  Fix it and I\'ll totally give five stars :)
reviews.author: Jeremy Gorske

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: I love this game.  It is truly addictive.   Just wish donuts would be easier to get.
reviews.author: Christy Moore

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I like this game in a games and great game rate5 awesome and I love green good gaphic cattle I just like it
reviews.author: Coco Bandicoot

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this game! I even love it more because its free and theres no limits to what you can do :) Sadly I had to re-install it. It is worth the wait for all the downloads though. This time around I will spend my doughnuts wisely :)
reviews.author: Labreesa Murphy

reviews.title: Love, LOVE this game!!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to play and you don\'t run our of energy. My 7 yr old loves it too!!!
reviews.author: Tricia Olsen

reviews.title: Fun game but crashes on gs4
reviews.comment: I love Simpsons but it keeps crashing on galaxy s4 please fix. I\'ll give 5 stars when it stops closing me out.
reviews.author: Jessicca Cowles

reviews.title: Love the game
reviews.comment: I wish you would add the lady GaGa Simpson that would be a great add to the game you could add like a stage or the train that she came in on add to start the quest off you could have Lisa feeling blue like in the show I love this game and I hope to see more of the beloved   characters but please let GaGa be one of them  Thank you So much
reviews.author: Jeffery Carr

reviews.title: Wonderfully relaxing!
reviews.comment: Fun to wander with your favorite characters while you creatively  undo Homer\'s latest screw-up.  It is addictive!  I love it!
reviews.author: Joan Manderano

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love the game. Wish there was a better way to earn donuts and improve my conform-o-meter.
reviews.author: Jane Palmer

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: I love the intereaction and is relaxing. Its fun going to neighbors and see what they have done with their town. Great app.
reviews.author: V Voge

reviews.title: Well done game!
reviews.comment: I\'ve designex enough games to recognize some really good work in this game. It\'s still a work in progress, but you have to hand it to the tireless developers who are fixing bugs, adding content and finding new ways to keep us engaged (and make enough money for EA to justify their existence).
reviews.author: Steve Engels
